lead_paragraph: SAD ACCIDENT.--We learn that Enoch Westwood, a boy aged 13, was killed at the Tivoli satinet factory, on Saturday morning. He had jumped upon the platform elevator, which is moved by water, and lying down was looking over the edge, when the elevator was passing the fifth floor, his head was caught between it and the beams and his neck broken.
